participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and quirky, enjoys sharing unique experiences and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_1.background: My brother thinks he is a viking. My masters degree is in Italian literature. My nails are painted green. I have a pet skunk. I live in a nice attic apartment in Portland, OR.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Practical and sociable, enjoys working with numbers and has a nurturing side as a parent.
participant_2.background: I am a blackjack dealer. I graduated with a statistics degree. I know how to count cards in blackjack. I have 3 kids. I am currently going back to school to try and become a casino manager.

content.text: Hey! I'm a masters degree holder in Italian Literature.
Wow, that's awesome! I graduated with a statistics degree.
What do you do for work?
I'm a blackjack dealer, but I'm currently going back to school to try and become a casino manager.
That sounds interesting! I have a pet skunk, what kind of pets do you have?
I have three kids!
Wow, that's a lot! Are they all boys or girls?
Two boys and one girl.
How old are they?
The oldest is 10, the middle one is 8, and the youngest is 5.
That's great! I have a brother who thinks he's a viking, what's the most interesting thing about your kids?
The youngest one is obsessed with dinosaurs. He can name all of them and even knows some facts about them.
That's amazing! I love dinosaurs too.
Me too! We're going to the natural history museum this weekend.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm going to visit my brother in Portland soon.
Oh, that's cool! I live in Portland.
I didn't know that! We should meet up for coffee sometime.
That would be great! I love meeting new people.
Me too! I'll DM you my number.
Sounds good!
